alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Otsego County through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milford, or near Cooperstown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Maryland, Cooperstown, Westville, Milford, Bowerstown, Schenevus, Cooperstown Junction, Elk Creek and Index. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 near 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
